vulnerability.name: USN-4047-2
vulnerability.description: USN-4047-1 fixed a vulnerability in libvirt. This update provides the corresponding update for Ubuntu 14.04 ESM.  Original advisory details:   Matthias Gerstner and Ján Tomko discovered that libvirt incorrectly handled  certain API calls. An attacker could possibly use this issue to check for  arbitrary files, or execute arbitrary binaries. In the default  installation, attackers would be isolated by the libvirt AppArmor profile.

statements.status_notes: Several security issues were fixed in libvirt. Available with Ubuntu Pro.
